name: Perry Pudan
text: The Ioniq 5 uses natural materials for their car, which can reduse the co2 produced at the moment of building it

name: Chicky Adamovitz
text: Really good evaluation. Oh and the Electric Grid cannot handle the production of Wind and Solar Energy (mostly Upper Midwest and Western production) to where the energy needs to be in all Cases, like the East Coast and East of the Mississippi. So there is an electric grid infrastructure problem to transition to renewables. EV's have less of a Climate Chaos Impact, the problem is that they still have a Significant Impact

name: Camala Yakobovitz
text: When temperatures drop below 20F, batteries lose 40% of their power.  Where I live in NW Alberta, temps drop below -40.  What do you think is going to happen to those batteries at -40?

name: Laurena Cahillane
text: If I have to drive an EV to work so I can drive my SS on the weekend I’m fine with that. I like the idea of EV’s but not the limitations.

name: Joyann Chestle
text: EV's can also use regenerative braking, making them more energy efficient

name: Jelene Dumphrey
text: Taking a lot of road trips recently and I find it interesting that with all the hype about how fast Teslas are, they’re consistently doing like 10mph BELOW the speed limit.

name: Archy Reeman
text: Recycling batteries check so you're including the carbon footprint when the batteries are part of the car but the usage of the gasoline to run the car isn't included in this scenario so you should factor that in

name: Zorana Alfonsetto
text: Solid State batteries...that should revolutionize energy storage for years to come.

name: Marcello Vanyukhin
text: I have had the same car for 23 years, it is the first and it will be the only one, I keep it to work properly and I have no problem, this is also ecological!

name: Vally McChruiter
text: For me in the perfect world there would be more electric cars on the road overall but that would mean l that gas cars are more special and for people who like them and can be used without any limitaion
